channel.title: Comments on: New Design for 50 Word Review

item.title: By: David Bailey
item.dc:creator: David Bailey
item.description: <p>I like the 50WordReview site. Great job. I guess it's about time for me to learn how to do the AJAX. Do you have any tips for getting started?</p>
item.content:encoded: I like the 50WordReview site. Great job. I guess it’s about time for me to learn how to do the AJAX. Do you have any tips for getting started?

item.title: By: Phillip Deftereos
item.dc:creator: Phillip Deftereos
item.description: <p>Cool ! I like the look of it. Very compact and neat.</p>
item.content:encoded: Cool ! I like the look of it. Very compact and neat.
